akn:content.akn:p:
§ 7382e. Waste management education research consortium (WERC)(a) 11 So in original. No subsec. (b) has been enacted. In generalThe Secretary is authorized to establish a partnership of Department of Energy laboratories, academic institutions, and private sector industries to conduct environmentally-related education programs, including programs involving environmentally conscious manufacturing and waste management activities that have undergraduate and graduate educational training as a component.
(Pub. L. 103–382, title V, § 517, Oct. 20, 1994, 108 Stat. 4044.)

akn:subsection.akn:heading: 11 So in original. No subsec. (b) has been enacted. In general

akn:content.akn:p: (a) The Secretary is authorized to establish a partnership of Department of Energy laboratories, academic institutions, and private sector industries to conduct environmentally-related education programs, including programs involving environmentally conscious manufacturing and waste management activities that have undergraduate and graduate educational training as a component.
